page.title: 05LIFE STYLES - A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: On school days my mum wakes me up, my dad is the first one to get up.I get dressed then I get washed I have a drink of milk for my breakfast. After I have my drink of milk I wait for my taxi, when it comes I sit in the front. We come to school, I get out, we cross the road, I cut across the grass to come into the playground.A teacher calls us in. When we get in we all like to talk a lot. We get our work out for another day. I had a feeling that me and Mike would get into big trouble when Mrs. Stothard had done the register. We line up for assembly, we get in, me and Michael were messing about and we got sent out. Mrs. Stothard made us stay in for a week and do more work. At dinner time we were sitting
